        public boolean isDead()
        This method is used to determine if the player character has depleted all of its health.
        Returns:

        public int getHealth()
        This method is used to return the amount of remaining health the player character has.
        Returns:
        the remaining health.

      • setHealth

        public void setHealth(int health)
        This method is used to set the amount of health the player character starts the level with.
        Parameters:
        health - is the number of "hearts".

      • setDead

        public void setDead(boolean dead)
        This method is used to kill the player whenever its remaining health reaches zero.
        Parameters:
        dead - is a boolean (it's set to true).

      • hit

        public void hit(int damage)
        An enemy can hit the player. Decreases the health only if the flinching is set to false. Notify the update to the observers.
        Parameters:
        damage -

      • hookUpdate

        public abstract void hookUpdate()
        This method must be implemented by a concrete class. It deals with the animation of the sprite.

      • update

        public void update()
        This method is used to update the animation of the character and to check for eventual collisions with the map or with the enemies/items.

      • draw

        This method draws the sprite depending on which direction it's facing (right or left).
        Specified by:
        draw in class Sprite
        Parameters:
        g - is the Graphics2D object we use to draw the image.
